name: conxian
description: Conxian is a sophisticated DeFi yield optimization protocol on Stacks, designed to automate and enhance returns from liquidity provision and yield farming.

scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:integration && npm run test:enterprise && npm run test:load && npm run test:tokens
scripts.test:production: npm run test:enterprise && npm run test:flash-loans && npm run test:integration && npm run test:tokens
scripts.ci: node ./scripts/ensure-deps.js && node ./scripts/validate-docs.js && node ./scripts/verify-contracts.cjs && npx vitest run --config vitest.config.enhanced.ts --pool=threads
scripts.test:dex-dimension: vitest run tests/dex/**/*.ts tests/dex-factory*.ts tests/pool-integration.test.ts tests/pool-management.test.ts tests/liquidity-provider.test.ts tests/price-impact-calculator.test.ts tests/router/**/*.ts tests/mev-protector.test.ts --config vitest.config.enhanced.ts
scripts.test:lending-dimension: vitest run tests/lending/**/*.ts tests/comprehensive-lending-system.*.ts tests/flash-loan-integration.test.ts tests/loan-liquidation-manager.spec.ts tests/lending-system-*.ts tests/liquidation-manager-test.ts --config vitest.config.enhanced.ts
scripts.test:governance-dimension: vitest run tests/governance/**/*.ts tests/governance-token.test.ts tests/governance-signature-verifier.test.ts tests/tokenized-bond.test.ts --config vitest.config.enhanced.ts
scripts.test:dimensional-dimension: vitest run tests/dimensional/**/*.ts tests/dimensional-engine.test.ts tests/pool-integration.test.ts tests/funding-rate-calculations.test.ts tests/sbtc-integration.test.ts --config vitest.config.enhanced.ts
